Nestled in Glyfada, this elegant hotel offers a perfect point of departure to explore the archaeological sites, historical buildings, museums and cathedrals. The beach is around 50 m away and Glyfada Square, with its modern shopping and sports venues, its lively Greek taverns, harbours and exciting nightlife, is just a few paces away. Glyfada itself is around 15 km from the centre of Athens. The hotel offers a choice of opulent, modern and ample rooms with inviting balconies, from which guests have a view of either the Saronic Gulf or of the mountains. The air-conditioned and soundproofed units are cosily furnished and make for a pleasant and comfortable stay. The hotel has its own swimming pool and the nearest 18-hole golf course is just 1 km away. The elegant restaurant serves a lavish continental, English and American buffet-style breakfast and visitors may also enjoy the choice of Greek or international dishes and wide selection of finest Greek wines.

The Hellinis Hotel, ideally suitable for both leisure and business traveller, appeals to the demanding guest who looks a subtle luxury and a high level of services. Centrally located close to Acropolis, Constitution Square, next to the business, shopping and entertainment area of Athens. The 86 fully-renovated rooms are equipped with private facilities, air conditioning, sound proof double glazing windows, electronic door locks, direct dial phone, satellite TV, hairdryer, mini fridge, electronic safe and free access to internet services. The hotel offers an elegant Restaurant, a Cocktail Bar, Cafeteria, Room Service, a comfortable TV lounge, Safe deposit facilities and free luggage storage.From the date of: 31/12/2017 Service Tax payable directly at the hotel.From the date of: 01/11/2018 City Tax payable directly at the hotel.

Located around the block from Amsterdams Sarphatipark and the famous Albert Cuyp street market. It has a 24-hour reception, a bicycle rental service and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. Every morning, guests can opt for a breakfast buffet in the lounge of Hotel Atlantis. The direct around offers a wide variety of restaurants for dinner. The Heinenken Experience is 900 metres on foot. From the tram stop next door, sites such as Rijksmuseum, Leidse Square and Central Train Station are easy to reach. *5% City Tax (5,5% for stays from the 1st Jan 2013), direct payment at the hotel.

Located in Kaleici’s Old Town, this pension is 500 metres from the Mediterranean Sea. It has a tour desk. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. The air-conditioned rooms at the Erkal Pansion have parquet flooring and include a TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a spacious seating area and a private balcony. Guests of the Erkal can start off their day with a rich breakfast prepared with seasonal ingredients. A shared kitchen is also available for those who like to prepare their own meals. The Pansion’s front desk can arrange tours to historical locations, including Aspendos, Perge, Termessos, Side and Olimpos. Lara and Konyaalti are a 10-minute bus ride away.WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. Free public parking is possible at a location nearby (reservation is not needed). Pets are not allowed. All children are welcome. All children under 11 years stay free of charge when using existing beds. There is no capacity for extra beds in the room. The maximum number of total guests in a room is 6. There is no capacity for cots in the room.

Situated in a prime setting at the heart of the mesmerising city of Athens, this hotel is located in close proximity to the National Museum and Plaka Square. The hotel offers guests a great location from which to explore the delights that this captivating city has to offer, as well as a boundless array of shopping opportunities, dining options and entertainment venues. The hotel is located within easy access of the Acropolis and Lycabettus Hill. Bathed in the rich culture and history of the city, this charming hotel embodies the elegance and style of a bygone era. HotelName: Prestige Hotel and Aquapark - All Inclusive
HotelDescription: Prestige Hotel and Aquapark is a 4-star apartment hotel, situated just 150 metres from the beach in Golden Sands resort and 18 km from Varna. The hotel has an indoor swimming pool, and an outdoor swimming pool for adults and children, offering free deck chairs and umbrellas. All of the modern rooms are elegantly, comfortably and functionally furnished. They are especially suited for families with children. A 24-hour guarded parking is available on site. The spa centre of the hotel includes a sauna, massages, hydro-massage and fitness. A beauty centre is also available here. The chic buffet-restaurant, next to the lobby has a wonderful view to the hotels garden and the swimming pool. Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request, at an extra charge. The management and the personnel of the Prestige Hotel and Aquapark will make sure that you experience a relaxing and unforgettable stay.

This beach hotel is situated in the commercial suburb of Glyfada, near the beach resort known as the 'Athenian Riviera'. The heart of the Greek capital is a 20-minute drive away and Glyfada Square, with its shopping and sports centres, restaurants serving all choices of international cuisine and non-stop nightlife, is a 5-minute walk away. The modern 7-storey building is furnished in a classy style and offers all the conveniences required by business and leisure travellers. There are specially-dedicated executive rooms decorated in different styles and perfectly equipped for business use. Those who need to take their meetings to a more casual surrounding can book a round at the nearby 18-hole golf course. The rest of the guests can spend their days lazing around in the garden with its outdoor swimming pool or working on their tan and enjoying the waves at the nearby beach.

Opened in 2005, the fantastic modern Royal Wings hotel is situated on 72,000 m2 of an extraordinary garden and pool landscape frontline to the beach and the warm waters of the Mediterranean Sea. The city centre of Antalya is only 17 km away, while the international airport can be reached within a short drive. The hotel excels in every aspect: it features various pools including a vast lagoon-style pool, the largest of the Lara region with more than 3,000 m2. Children will love the children's pools with slides and animation as well as the mini club with cinema, mini disco and a host of other activities. Guests can spoil their taste buds in a buffet and various delicious à la carte restaurants, while 9 bars invite to have a drink. Excellent sports facilities including a bowling alley, an amphitheatre for 1,000 people and a wonderful spa and wellness area complete the offer.

The Conservatorium Hotel is a true design hotel that combines historical architecture with modern design, designed by Piero Lissoni. This magnificent neo-Gothic building was originally built in the late 19th century and was transformed into a contemporary luxury hotel. It is the first member of The Set, a collection created to redefine the concept of luxury hotel for sophisticated, design literate travelers in the 21st century.It disposes of 129 historical rooms and suites spread over 8 floors. All rooms are equipped with LCD TV, Wi-Fi Internet, telephone, gourmet mini-bar, fruit and water, brushed-oak flooring and beige furniture define the cool autumnal colour scheme that is both modern and classic at the same time.This hotel has 5 dining spaces: The Conservatorium Brasserie, The Conservatorium Lobby, Tunes Restaurant and Bar by Schilo and Private Dining Room. In addition to offering 6 meeting conferences and functional rooms, (Symphony Room, Harmony Room, Blue Room, Yellow Room, Orange Room and Red Room), Akasha Holistic Wellbeing Wellness Centre (of 1000 sq., with gym, spa, swimming pool, Hamman and Watsu pool, yoga, Pilates, meditation room and therapies), terrace, shops and a Hairdresser.Check-In: 14h00Check-Out: 12h00Children AcceptedCredit Cards AcceptedFrom the date of: 01/01/2020 City Tax of 7% + 3

This hotel is situated on Omonia Square in the very centre of Athens. The 18-storey hotel has 490 rooms with a fresh design and high-quality equipment. It offers free Wi-Fi, HD TV and air conditioning and will make you feel at home. Located a 7-minute walk from Omonia Square and half a mile from Monastiraki Square, Athens Town Hall Art Loft in Athens has air-conditioned accommodations with views of the city and free WiFi. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A fridge, a stovetop and toaster are also available, as well as an electric tea pot and a coffee machine. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include National Theatre of Greece, University of Athens and Ermou Street. The nearest airport is Eleftherios Venizelos Airport, 20 miles from Athens Town Hall Art Loft.WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge. No parking available. Pets are not allowed. All children are welcome. There is no capacity for extra beds in the room. The maximum number of total guests in a room is 5. There is no capacity for cribs in the room.

Residence Ambient is a charming 3-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Brasov. It boasts free Wi-Fi and a good location close to the old town. Brasov is a historic city with some fine architecture including medieval alleys, Saxon citadels and fortified churches. Nearby places of interest include the Black Church, Mount Tampa and the First Romanian School Museum. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Brasov destinations. The hotel is housed in a smart mid-rise building with a light-coloured facade and white window frames. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple elegant style with neutral and earth tones. Some rooms feature exposed beams. Amenities include a fan, work desk and satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. A shared kitchen and lounge is provided. There are also plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite.***Please note guests are required to check-in at Pensiune Ambient, situated at 62 Iuliu Maniu Street.***.

Grand Hotel London is a 5-star boutique property offering elegant accommodation and stylish interiors in the heart of Varna. Highlights include a gym, a restaurant, a bar, a spa and free Wi-Fi. The hotel sits in the heart of Varna within walking distance of the city centre, the central train station and the citys main historical places. Varna International airport is also only a short drive away. The hotel occupies a mid-rise building with traditional architecture, which was built in the period of 1906-1912. The spa comprises a sauna, a Jacuzzi and massage rooms. There is also a modern gym, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are elegantly decorated with calm, soothing tones. Amenities include air-conditioning, a telephone, free Wi-Fi, cable TV, a mini-bar and a security safe. The bathrooms offer a bathtub, hairdryer, toiletries and bathrobes. The menu at the Restaurant Musala offers a combination of French cuisine and traditional Bulgarian specialities. An extensive wine list is also available. Guests can also enjoy selected coffee brands, a special tea collection, cocktails, homemade pastries and light dishes in the Grand Cafe. The hotel offers room service.

Beautifully nestled on the eastern seaside of Cyprus, right next to one of its most picturesque beaches and the famous area of Grecian Bay, with its breath-taking views and natural environment. Within 200 metres from the hotel guests can find plenty of restaurants, traditional tavernas and small coffee shops. The nearest bus stop is 50 metres away and the town centre is just a 10-minute walk away. This ideal location makes it suitable for both those that just want to relax and those that prefer a more active vacation. Besides the fully equipped gym it offers a Volleyball and a tennis court and on the beach water sport fans will be spoiled for choice. But there are plenty of options to simply relax too, sipping refreshing drink on the sun-deck next to the lagoon style pool seems like a good start and if some pampering is needed the sauna, steam bath and a massage treatment may just do it.

The atmosphere at this modern hotel complex charms its guests and is ideal for an unforgettable family holiday. The hotel complex consists of a total of 22 rooms, including 30 suites and 18 bungalows. A foyer awaits guests with a reception desk, a small supermarket, shops, lounges, a hairdressers and a lift. An extensive wine list is also available. Guests can also enjoy selected coffee brands, a special tea collection, cocktails, homemade pastries and light dishes in the Grand Cafe. The hotel offers room service.

Salzburg is a historic, hilly city famous as Mozarts birthplace. It straddles the Salzach river and boasts many beautiful Baroque buildings. Nearby places of interest include medieval Hohensalzburg Castle, Mirabell Palace, Salzburg Cathedral and St Peters Abbey, a charming Romanesque complex home to Europes oldest restaurant. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Salzburg destinations. The hotel occupies an elegant 19th-century property featuring a classic, yellow facade with white, arched windows and a decorative wrought iron sign. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, radio and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub or shower. Welcome on board the Botel Hotel - a unique 3-star experience in every way! Situated now across the Het IJ, only 10 minutes from central Station by the free hotel ferry shuttle, the Amstel is a modern, superior floating hotel with 175 comfortable guestrooms, all of which are equipped with satellite TV, radio, safe, pay TV and en suite shower/WC facilities as standard. The new hotel's location is the former NDSM-shipyard. This colourful and vital dockside area now houses workshops and artists' studios, hip cafes and restaurants, exhibitions and performances. Among others the media wharf houses MTV, Robodock, and the IJ-festival. The free ferry connection (and shuttle bus) makes this charming and intriguing city easy to explore and discover. Once in Central Station, many of Amsterdam's sights and attractions can be easily reached on foot; Dam Square, Anne Frank's House, the Flower Market, as well as the famous (or infamous!) Red Light District. Once the day's sightseeing draws to an end, guests are invited to relax in the hotel bar, or enjoy a game or two of pool over a nice cold glass of beer - naturally! ***Customers must pay a city tax by the property***From the date of: 01/01/2020
